channel.title: Code Question
channel.description:
I was wondering what the code would be todo this:
For team battles, you type ::blue for a blue cape and ::green for a green one. Now, how would I make it so the person's name on the player'r list AND, optionally, the name over their head, change to the team they are on?
Help would be nice. ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: March 11, 2007, 08:29:48 AM[/size][hr]No idea? ???
